feedback: Severely stiff elbow reduces follow-through fluidity, affecting consistency.
Fully extend but relax elbow for smooth, consistent follow-through.
Severely tense shoulder reduces follow-through fluidity, affecting consistency.
Relax shoulder significantly for smooth follow-through.
Severely overextended hips cause major balance loss on landing.
Extend hips fully but maintain significant balance for stable landing.
Severely overextended knees cause major balance loss on landing.
Extend knees fully with significant balance for stable landing.
Severely flexed guide wrist disrupts follow-through balance.
Maintain neutral guide wrist for consistent follow-through.
Severely overextended guide knee causes major balance loss on landing.
Extend guide knee fully with significant symmetry for stable landing.
Severely flared elbow disrupts alignment, causing major accuracy loss.
Keep elbow tightly tucked to align with basket.
Severely flexed wrist disrupts grip, causing fumbling.
Reduce wrist flexion significantly for stable grip.
Severely raised shoulder disrupts body alignment, causing major accuracy loss.
Lower shoulder significantly for consistent setup.
Severely premature hip extension disrupts timing, causing imbalance.
Maintain significant hip bend for balanced transition.
Severely delayed knee extension slows transition, rushing shot.
Extend knees significantly for smoother transition.
Severely flared guide elbow disrupts alignment, causing major accuracy loss.
Keep guide elbow tightly tucked for proper setup.
Severely flexed guide wrist causes fumbling, disrupting shot.
Keep guide wrist neutral for stable grip.
Severely premature guide hip extension disrupts balance, affecting rhythm.
Maintain significant guide hip bend for symmetry.
Severely delayed guide knee extension slows transition, rushing shot.
Extend guide knee significantly for smoother transition.
Severely extended elbow leads to ball loaded too low, slowing release.
Significantly bend elbow to keep ball at chest level for fluid motion.
Severely rigid wrist misaligns ball, disrupting setup.
Maintain neutral wrist position to align ball properly.
Severely low shoulder misaligns ball, disrupting setup.
Elevate shoulder significantly for proper ball positioning.
Severely straight hips create unstable base, drastically reducing power.
Bend hips significantly for a balanced, athletic stance.
Severely excessive knee bend causes major instability, slowing shot.
Reduce knee bend significantly for better mobility and balance.
Severely bent guide elbow interferes with shooting hand, slowing shot.
Extend guide elbow significantly for better control.
Severely excessive guide hip bend causes major imbalance.
Reduce guide hip bend significantly for better balance.
Severely excessive guide knee bend causes major imbalance.
Reduce guide knee bend significantly for better balance.
Severely early extension leads to low release point, flattening trajectory.
Maintain significant elbow bend for higher release and better arc.
Severely excessive snap causes erratic release, reducing accuracy.
Moderate wrist snap significantly for controlled release.
Severely raised shoulder causes low release point, straining shot.
Relax shoulder significantly for higher release and consistency.
Severely overextended hips cause backward lean, losing balance.
Extend hips fully while maintaining significant balance.
Incomplete knee drive reduces elevation.
Fully extend knees for maximum shot power.
Bent guide elbow interferes with shot release.
Extend guide elbow slightly for stability.
Extended guide wrist pushes ball off-line.
Keep guide wrist neutral to avoid interference.
Overextended guide hip causes imbalance.
Fully extend guide hip symmetrically for stability.
Severely incomplete guide knee extension reduces stability drastically.
Fully extend guide knee for maximum power and stability.
